sentences.sContent: She decided she would try to forget the episode by the lake.
sentences.sCn: 她决心尽量忘掉湖边的那次经历。

sentences.sContent: one of the most interesting episodes in his career
sentences.sCn: 他职业生涯中最有趣的时期之一

synos.tran: 插曲；一段情节；插话；有趣的事件

trans.tranCn: 一段时期； 片段， 插曲； 一集
trans.tranOther: an event or a short period of time during which something happens
